results.question: As an architect for a large enterprise, you're designing a multi-account strategy. Which AWS service would you use to centrally manage multiple AWS accounts?
Your company wants to enforce a consistent security baseline across all AWS accounts. Which Organizations feature would you implement to achieve this?
You need to grant temporary access to an EC2 instance for a developer. Which AWS identity type is most appropriate for this scenario?
To limit the maximum permissions an IAM entity can have, regardless of what policies are attached to it, which AWS feature would you use?
Your organization wants to centralize logging for all AWS accounts. Which Organizations feature would you use to automatically enable CloudTrail in all accounts?
You need to grant cross-account access to an S3 bucket. Which type of policy would you primarily use to achieve this?
A company wants to enforce a consistent tagging strategy across all AWS accounts in their organization. Which AWS service should the architect use?
An architect is designing a solution to manage access for thousands of employees across multiple AWS accounts. Which AWS service should they use to implement Single Sign-On?
A company wants to ensure that no AWS account in their organization can create Internet Gateways. Which AWS Organizations feature should the architect use to implement this restriction?
An architect needs to design a solution that allows developers to assume roles in multiple AWS accounts using their corporate credentials. Which AWS service should they use?
